sentences.en: Doctors often extol the virtues of eating less fat.
sentences.cn: 医生常常宣扬少吃脂肪的好处。

sentences.en: We will extol your love more than wine.
sentences.cn: 我们要称赞你的爱情，胜似称赞美酒。

sentences.en: You are my God, and I give thanks to You; You are my God, I extol You.
sentences.cn: 你是我的神，我要称谢你。你是我的神，我要尊崇你。
